roberta_planks_for_the_past.title: Planks for the Past
roberta_planks_for_the_past.description: Roberta's fishmonger shop is falling apart. She needs help repairing a large hole in the wall.

stages.text: I should speak to Roberta at Tide & Trade to see what's troubling her.
I need to find a way to get 10 Wooden Planks to help Roberta.
I have the planks. I should use them to repair the wall at Tide & Trade.
The wall is fixed. I should talk to Roberta to receive my reward.

luke_tutorial.title: Luke's First Day
luke_tutorial.description: Learn the basics: navigate, talk, choose a perk, share breakfast, meet friends, and survive the night.

stages.text: Learn the location UI.
Leave the room and go to Leo's Lighthouse.
Talk to Old Leo.
Choose a starting perk.
Eat breakfast at the orphanage.
Play with Sarah or Robert, or alone.
End the day and go to sleep.
Kyle bursts in: Robert's in trouble at the docks! Help him escape from smugglers.

finn_debt_collection.title: Finn's Debt Collection
finn_debt_collection.description: Finn at the Salty Mug says Luke owes three months of rent (18 silvers). He knows you can't pay and offers a job: collect 10 silvers each from Ben (Homestead Farm), Beryl (Beryl's General Goods), and Elara (Herbalist's Hovel). Return with 30 silvers within 7 days.

stages.text: Speak to Finn at the Salty Mug.
Collect 10 silvers from Ben at Homestead Farm.
Collect 10 silvers from Beryl at Beryl's General Goods.
Collect 10 silvers from Elara at the Herbalist's Hovel.
Bring 30 silvers to Finn within 7 days.

rebel_path.title: The Rot in the Mug
rebel_path.description: Old Crank at the Salty Mug hints that Finn is involved in something darker than just racketeering. He claims to have seen weapons being moved at night.

stages.text: Old Crank is drinking at the tavern. He might know something if I keep his mug full.
Investigate Old Crank's lead: A 'kid with weapons' was seen sneaking from the Salty Mug to the Forge. Confront Cyrus the Apprentice.
I found a strange blade. Maybe I should show this to a guard.
Prepare for the raid. Speak to Sergeant Rodrick in the Tidehunter Quarter when you are ready to storm the Salty Mug.
Defeat Finn and his thugs.
